trans-unit.source: Defines the end of a relationship.
<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd> defines the requirements for an object that represents an end in an association.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd> 會針對在關聯中代表某一端的物件定義需求。

trans-unit.source: This interface is implemented by the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面由實作<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>類別。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> is the base class for the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> 是基底類別<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>和<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>類別。

trans-unit.source: The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832), which was generated by the [Entity Data Model Wizard](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/423ec9a7-5464-43b7-a7ef-9f5f000848b5).
trans-unit.target: 本主題中的範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)，所產生[實體資料模型精靈](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/423ec9a7-5464-43b7-a7ef-9f5f000848b5)。

trans-unit.source: The following example adds new `SalesOrderHeader` entities to the `Contact` entity.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將新`SalesOrderHeader`實體`Contact`實體。

trans-unit.source: Then it gets all related ends from the `Contact` entity and displays relationship name, source role name, and target role name for each related end.
trans-unit.target: 然後它會取得所有相關的端從`Contact`實體，並顯示關聯性名稱、 來源角色名稱和目標角色名稱，每個相關端。

trans-unit.source: Adds an object to the related end.
An object to add to the collection.
<c>entity</c> must implement <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships" />.
Adds an object to the related end.
The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A> method adds an object to the related end.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A> 方法會將物件加入至相關端。

trans-unit.source: The related end must be an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: 相關端必須是 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>。

trans-unit.source: When the source object implements <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships> and is being tracked in the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager>, the object being added is also tracked.
trans-unit.target: 當來源物件會實作<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>中追蹤和<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager>，也會追蹤所加入的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class explicitly implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> 類別會明確實作 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> class uses this implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> 類別會使用這個實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Add%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Add%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the related end is an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> and the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601.Value%2A> property of the reference is not `null`, this method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果相關的端<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>和<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601.Value%2A>參考的屬性不是`null`，這個方法會擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: An object to add to the collection.
Adds an object to the related end.
Use this method overload for entity classes that do not implement <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.
trans-unit.target: 使用的實體類別，不會實作這個方法多載<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A> method for entity classes that do implement <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A>實體類別會實作的方法<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A> method adds an object to the related end.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A> 方法會將物件加入至相關端。

trans-unit.source: The related end must be an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: 相關端必須是 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class explicitly implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> 類別會明確實作 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> class uses this implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> 類別會使用這個實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Add%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Add%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the related end is an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> and the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601.Value%2A> property of the reference is not `null`, this method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果相關的端<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>和<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601.Value%2A>參考的屬性不是`null`，這個方法會擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Defines a relationship between two attached objects.
The object being attached.
<c>entity</c> must implement <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships" />.
Defines a relationship between two attached objects.

The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A> method is used to define a relationship between two objects that are both attached to the same <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A> 方法是用來定義同時附加至相同 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> 執行個體之兩個物件之間的關聯性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class explicitly implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> 類別會明確實作 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> class uses this implementation to define relationships between the attached source object and the object attached to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> 類別會使用這個實作來定義所附加來源物件與附加至集合之物件之間的關聯性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Attaching and Detaching Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[附加和卸離物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23)。

trans-unit.source: The object being attached.
Defines a relationship between two attached objects.
Use this method overload for entity classes that do not implement <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.
trans-unit.target: 使用的實體類別，不會實作這個方法多載<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A> method for entity classes that do implement <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A>實體類別會實作的方法<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A> method is used to define a relationship between two objects that are both attached to the same <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A> 方法是用來定義同時附加至相同 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> 執行個體之兩個物件之間的關聯性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class explicitly implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> 類別會明確實作 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> class uses this implementation to define relationships between the attached source object and the object attached to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> 類別會使用這個實作來定義所附加來源物件與附加至集合之物件之間的關聯性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Attaching and Detaching Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[附加和卸離物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23)。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> that represents the objects that belong to the related end.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> that represents the objects that belong to the related end.
The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.CreateSourceQuery%2A> method is explicitly implemented by the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.CreateSourceQuery%2A> 類別會明確實作 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> classes both override the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.System%23Data%23Objects%23DataClasses%23IRelatedEnd%23CreateSourceQuery%2A> method to return an <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> that, when it is executed, returns the same set of objects that belong to the related end.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> 和 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> 類別會同時覆寫 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.System%23Data%23Objects%23DataClasses%23IRelatedEnd%23CreateSourceQuery%2A> 方法來傳回 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>，以便在執行此查詢時，傳回屬於相關端的相同物件集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> that iterates through the collection of related objects.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> that iterates through the collection of related objects.
Gets a value that indicates whether all related objects have been loaded.
<see langword="true" /> if the related end contains all the related entities from the database; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果相關的端包含從資料庫的所有相關的實體否則， <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A> method of <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> 類別會實作 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A> 的 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd> 方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> classes inherit from <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> 和 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> 類別繼承自 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>。

trans-unit.source: [Defining and Managing Relationships](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2c92c097-56bd-4145-989e-16d92475ecda)
trans-unit.target: [定義和管理關聯性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2c92c097-56bd-4145-989e-16d92475ecda)

trans-unit.source: Loads the related object or objects into this related end.
`Load` is called to explicitly load related objects from a related end that is exposed by a navigation property.
trans-unit.target: `Load` 呼叫可從相關端所公開的導覽屬性，明確載入相關的物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Loading Related Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[載入相關物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1)。

trans-unit.source: Loads the related object or objects into this related end with the default merge option.
The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Load%2A> method of <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> 類別會實作 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Load%2A> 的 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd> 方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A> is called to explicitly load related objects from a related end exposed by a navigation property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A> 呼叫可從相關端的導覽屬性所公開，明確載入相關的物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Loading Related Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[載入相關物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A> method loads related objects from the data source whether or not <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A>方法會載入相關的物件資料來源是否<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A>是`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption" /> to use when merging objects into an existing <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection`1" />.
Loads the related object or objects into the related end with the specified merge option.
The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Load%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> 類別會實作 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Load%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> classes override this implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> 和 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> 類別會同時覆寫這個實作。

trans-unit.source: `Load` is called to explicitly load related objects from a related end that is exposed by a navigation property.
trans-unit.target: `Load` 呼叫可從相關端所公開的導覽屬性，明確載入相關的物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Loading Related Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[載入相關物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Load%2A> method loads related objects from the data source whether or not <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Load%2A>方法會載入相關的物件資料來源是否<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A>是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the relationship in which this related end participates.
The name of the relationship in which this <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd" /> is participating.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd" /> 所參與之關聯性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The relationship name is not namespace qualified.
trans-unit.target: 此關聯性名稱不符合命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832), which was generated by the [Entity Data Model Wizard](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/423ec9a7-5464-43b7-a7ef-9f5f000848b5).
trans-unit.target: 本主題中的範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)，所產生[實體資料模型精靈](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/423ec9a7-5464-43b7-a7ef-9f5f000848b5)。

trans-unit.source: The following example adds new `SalesOrderHeader` entities to the `Contact` entity.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將新`SalesOrderHeader`實體`Contact`實體。

trans-unit.source: Then it gets all related ends from the `Contact` entity and displays the relationship name, source role name, and target role name for each related end.
trans-unit.target: 然後它會取得所有相關的端從`Contact`實體，並顯示每個相關端的關聯性名稱、 來源角色名稱和目標角色名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to the metadata for the related end.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipSet" /> object that contains metadata for the end of a relationship.
trans-unit.target: 包含關聯性端點中繼資料的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipSet" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Removes an object from the collection of objects at the related end.
The object to remove from the collection.
<c>entity</c> must implement <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships" />.
Removes an object from the collection of objects at the related end.

<see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="entity" /> was successfully removed, <see langword="false" /> if <paramref name="entity" /> was not part of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd" />.
The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A> method removes an object from the related end.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A> 方法會從相關端中移除物件。

trans-unit.source: The related end must be an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: 相關端必須是 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class explicitly implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> 類別會明確實作 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> class uses this implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> 類別會使用這個實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Remove%2A>。

trans-unit.source: An object to remove from the collection.
Removes an object from the collection of objects at the related end.

<see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="entity" /> was successfully removed; <see langword="false" /> if <paramref name="entity" /> was not part of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd" />.
Use this method overload for entity classes that do not implement <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.
trans-unit.target: 使用的實體類別，不會實作這個方法多載<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A> method for entity classes that do implement <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A>實體類別會實作的方法<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A> method removes an object from the related end.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A> 方法會從相關端中移除物件。

trans-unit.source: The related end must be an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: 相關端必須是 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class explicitly implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> 類別會明確實作 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> class uses this implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> 類別會使用這個實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Remove%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the role name at the source end of the relationship.
The role name at the source end of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 位於關聯性來源端的角色名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.SourceRoleName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>類別會實作<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.SourceRoleName%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.SourceRoleName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.SourceRoleName%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The role name is specified by the `Role` attribute of the `End` element in the association that defines this relationship in the conceptual model.
trans-unit.target: 角色名稱由指定`Role`屬性`End`概念模型中定義此關聯性的關聯中的項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Association Element (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Association 項目 (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the role name at the target end of the relationship.
The role name at the target end of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 關聯性目標端的角色名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.TargetRoleName%2A> property.
